analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 8.62. Savicāraduka🔽Nasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Naavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: sa vicāra duka  na sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca na sa vicāraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  na avicāram dhammam paṭicca na avicāraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: The Savicāra Duka🔽With applied thought and sustained thought as condition there arises a state with applied thought and sustained thought. … (Three triads and three dukas are omitted.)🔽With applied thought and sustained thought as condition there arises a state without applied thought and sustained thought. … (Three triads and three dukas are omitted.)

original: Nasavicārañca naavicārañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa vicāram ca na avicāram ca dhammam paṭicca na sa vicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With applied thought and sustained thought and without applied thought and sustained thought as condition there arises a state with applied thought and sustained thought. … (Three triads and three dukas are omitted.) (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane cha pe avigate nava
